name: starwars-chat-extension
description: XKE Chat Sample - Chat with star wars characters
author: Matt Olson

chatParticipants.name: Yoda
chatParticipants.description: A wise Jedi Master with great knowledge.

commands.name: force-wisdom
commands.description: Yoda shares his wisdom on a random topic.

commands.name: force-meld
commands.description: Yoda can connect you with the spirits of the Jedi past.

chatParticipants.name: C-3PO
chatParticipants.description: A protocol droid fluent in over six million forms of communication, but not always the most helpful.

commands.name: translate
commands.description: C-3PO can translate code into any language.

commands.name: complain
commands.description: C-3PO can complain about the state of your code.

commands.name: protocol-optimization
commands.description: C-3PO can optimize your code for protocol droid efficiency.
